properties.body:
SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
F/V NOVO MADRE CARMELA REPORTS CREWMAN
WITH HEAT STROKE REQUIRING MEDICAL ASSISTANCE IN
02-11.00S 013-20.00W AT 242000Z MAR. VESSELS IN
VICINITY ABLE TO PROVIDE MEDICAL ASSISTANCE
REQUESTED TO ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ABIDJAN, PHONE: 225 272 126 6929,
225 272 126 2998, EMAIL: MOC.ABIDJAN.CI@GMAIL.COM.
